content: Instant APIs from any JavaScript file or Node package.
title: First Release of RESTUtils Host

content: More than likely you’re here for the RESTUtils Host; a small utility that instantly converts any JavaScript library or Node package into a web-based REST API with one command: npx restutils-host --path ~/my-utility.js Of course, you can tell it to grab your package from a Git repo: npx restutils-host --repo https://github.com/codergod/my-utility.git … or even NPM itself, if your library is already published… npx restutils-host --name my-utility Here’s a quick video showing how to use it: Should you run into any snags, or have questions, feel free to reach out: info@restutils.com Until then, have a great day! Thanx, Fred
